--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Notting that everyoned was ready, Cliffjumper slowly began to take 
off.
> "Let's roll boys." he said with enthusiasm, as Beachcomber quickly 
got
> up to speed. Firedrill on the other hand accelerated very slowly, as 
not
> to disturb his passanger.

::REDHOT::

    Redhot's sole response to Firedrill's movement was to caugh 
quietly and shift himself. He hoped his wings were not a discomfort to
the Autobot.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
